alert.note: Alert for Lea (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 11 at 7:14PM MDT until September 11 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Lea County in southeastern New Mexico... Northwestern Andrews County in western Texas... Gaines County in western Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT/815 PM MDT/. * At 814 PM CDT/714 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hobbs, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Seminole, Nadine, Gaines County Airport, Humble City, Knowles, Frankel City, Lea County Regional Airport, Industrial Airpark, Paynes Corner, Higginbotham, and Gaines County Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
